ARR233

Class SessionFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • ARR233.SessionFetcher
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Tests

    public abstract class SessionFetcher
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles generating all UDP packet requests, recieving generated responses, updating the view with these. UDP requests: READ WRITE MERGR_VIEWS UDP responses: FOUND_SESSION, STORED_SESSION, MERGE_VIEW_RESPONSE, SESSION_NOT_FOUND, NEWER_VERSION_IN_TABLE
    Author:
    Alice/Spencer

        s - server to gossip with
